results.title: Association of 3 Different Antihypertensive Medications With Hip and Pelvic Fracture Risk in Older Adults: Secondary Analysis of a Randomized Clinical Trial.
authors: Antihypertensive and Lipid-Lowering Treatment to Prevent Heart Attack Trial (ALLHAT) Collaborative Research Group
results.text_hl: DESIGN, SETTING, AND PARTICIPANTS: Using Veterans Affairs and Medicare claims data, this study examined @<m>DISEASE_Hip_Fractures</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D006620 @@@hip and pelvic fracture@@@ hospitalizations in Antihypertensive and @CHEMICAL_Lipids @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008055 @@@Lipid@@@-Lowering Treatment to Prevent @DISEASE_Myocardial_Infarction @DISEASE_MESH:D009203 @@@Heart Attack@@@ Trial participants randomized to first-step therapy with a @CHEMICAL_Thiazides @CHEMICAL_MESH:D049971 @@@thiazide@@@-type diuretic (@CHEMICAL_Chlorthalidone @CHEMICAL_MESH:D002752 @@@chlorthalidone@@@), a calcium channel blocker (@CHEMICAL_Amlodipine @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017311 @@@amlodipine besylate@@@), or an angiotensin-converting enzyme inhibitor (@<m>CHEMICAL_Lisinopril</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017706 @@@lisinopril@@@).

citations.NLM: Puttnam R, Davis BR, Pressel SL, Whelton PK, Cushman WC, Louis GT, Margolis KL, Oparil S, Williamson J, Ghosh A, Einhorn PT, Barzilay JI, Antihypertensive and Lipid-Lowering Treatment to Prevent Heart Attack Trial (ALLHAT) Collaborative Research Group. Association of 3 Different Antihypertensive Medications With Hip and Pelvic Fracture Risk in Older Adults: Secondary Analysis of a Randomized Clinical Trial. JAMA Intern Med. 2017 Jan 1;177(1):67-76. PMID: 27893045
citations.BibTeX: @article{27893045, title={Association of 3 Different Antihypertensive Medications With Hip and Pelvic Fracture Risk in Older Adults: Secondary Analysis of a Randomized Clinical Trial.}, author={Puttnam R and Davis BR and Pressel SL and Whelton PK and Cushman WC and Louis GT and Margolis KL and Oparil S and Williamson J and Ghosh A and Einhorn PT and Barzilay JI and Antihypertensive and Lipid-Lowering Treatment to Prevent Heart Attack Trial (ALLHAT) Collaborative Research Group}, journal={JAMA Intern Med}, volume={177}, number={1}, pages={67-76}}
